description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken With Spicy Red Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Chicken With Spicy Red Pesto
name: Roast Chicken With Spicy Red Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 45 minutes or until skin is golden brown and juices run clear when thigh joint is pierced. Cut chicken into pieces and brush with extra 2 tbs pesto. Serve with beets on a bed of 120g baby spinach leaves. Note: For this recipe refer to spicy red pesto recipe.

Bake for 45 minutes or until skin is golden brown and juices run clear when thigh joint is pierced. Cut chicken into pieces and brush with extra 2 tbs pesto. Serve with beets on a bed of 120g baby spinach leaves. Note: For this recipe refer to spicy red pesto recipe.
